committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits

official_title: To provide that the exception from the limitation on the accumulation of annual leave which currently applies to Federal employees affected by the closure of a military installation be extended to those affected by a realignment with respect to any such installation as well.

summary.text: Amends Federal civil service law to provide for the restoration of annual leave lost by employees affected by a military base realignment.

titles.title: To provide that the exception from the limitation on the accumulation of annual leave which currently applies to Federal employees affected by the closure of a military installation be extended to those affected by a realignment with respect to any such installation as well.
